DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether 24 weeks of Daclatasvir and Sofosbuvir with Ribavirin is safe and effective in the treatment of genotype 3 hepatitis C infected patients with liver cirrhosis.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Daclatasvir and Sofosbuvir With Ribavirin in Subjects With Cirrhosis and Genotype 3 Hepatitis C Infection
